body:
Hello guys, i've been wanting to make rushing tutorials and i need a good editing software.
so if you can please tell me the editing software you use (if you are using one)
and it would be great if u could link it
- Bo3abd99
body_tagged:
Hello guys, i've been wanting to make rushing tutorials and i need a good editing software.
so if you can please tell me the editing software you use (if you are using one)
and it would be great if u could link it
- Bo3abd99
title: any good recording software

replies.body: I use Quicktime on Mac, and iMovie. Though, if you have Windows, I heard Fraps and Vegas Pro is good.
replies.body_tagged: I use Quicktime on Mac, and iMovie. Though, if you have Windows, I heard Fraps and Vegas Pro is good.

replies.body: I use the combo of Fraps + Sony Vegas Pro 13
replies.body_tagged: I use the combo of Fraps + Sony Vegas Pro 13

replies.body: but sony vegas pro 13 costs money :/
replies.body_tagged: but sony vegas pro 13 costs money :/

replies.body:
ThePirateBay

Or just use a free trial or something; you can also look for a free video editor.

replies.body:
Mah Combo:

1) OBS + Sony Vegas 12
2) Fraps + AE
3) OBS + AE
4) Fraps + Sony vegas 12

To get sony vegas (Free): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lP9_Z7rC46c
AE: http://www.adobe.com/products/aftereffects.html?promoid=KFMVM

replies.body:
I use fraps + Sony Vegas Pro 12
Channel: MLGPorky

You can see the quality is pretty good and the framerate isn't even affected for me.
As for Vegas Pro costing money, just download a cracked version.
replies.body_tagged:
I use fraps + Sony Vegas Pro 12
Channel: MLGPorky

You can see the quality is pretty good and the framerate isn't even affected for me.
As for Vegas Pro costing money, just download a cracked version.

replies.body:
OBS
It's free with no watermark, and lag free.
If I'm not mistaken, you can also live stream as well (Twitch and stuff)
https://obsproject.com/
